entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
